title: Supercomputer Post-shipment Verification Act of 1999
content: Supercomputer Post-shipment Verification Act of 1999 - Prohibits the export or reexport of digital computers with a composite theoretical performance of more than 2,000 MTOPS to a country that has been a recipient of such exports for which post-shipment verifications have not been made during the period beginning on November 18, 1997, and ending September 30, 1998. Prohibits the subsequent export or reexport of such computers to such country until all post-shipment verifications have been made. Requires the Secretary of Commerce to report annually to specified congressional committees on the results of post-shipment verifications during the previous fiscal year. Directs the Secretary of Defense to report to specified congressional committees on the impact on national security of the export of such computers to countries listed as Computer Tier 3 eligible under section 740.7 of title 15 of the Code of Federal Regulations.
